did.abstract: Papers of William Richardson Davie (1756-1820), lawyer, Revolutionary soldier, and governor of North Carolina, include a letter from DeBretigney concerning Davie's marriage; a land grant; a letter from William Polk concerning the Blount Conspiracy to invade Florida and Louisiana; and a letter from James Holderness of Rockingham County, North Carolina, concerning a legal matter invovling W. Ricks.
